alert.note: Alert for Southwestern St. Lawrence (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Blizzard Warning issued December 25 at 4:26AM EST until December 25 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...BLIZZARD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Blizzard conditions. Additional snow accumulations of 4 to 12 inches expected, with highest amounts south and west of Route 68 and 56. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Southwestern St. Lawrence County. * WHEN...Until 7 PM EST this evening. * IMPACTS...Travel will be near impossible, with areas of snow, blowing snow and visibility below a quarter mile at times.
info.instruction: Strong winds will cause significant blowing and drifting snow, frequently reducing visibilities to below a quarter mile. Travel is strongly discouraged. If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency.
